name: theailabs-root
description: Root package for The AI Labs project

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.frontend:deploy: npm run frontend:build && wrangler pages deploy ./frontend/dist --project-name=theailabs-net
scripts.backend:deploy: npm install --prefix backend && wrangler deploy backend --env production
scripts.deploy: npm run frontend:deploy && npm run backend:deploy
